attributes.action: Give all NHS staff one weeks extra Annual Leave
attributes.additional_details: All NHS staff have worked tirelessly during the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic without furlough or financial compensation. They continue to work putting their mental & physical health at risk without complaint. Some have contracted COVID-19 & others have died selflessly caring for others. All staff honour their professional regulations by ‘putting the needs of the patient first’ to deliver best practice. We need to retain this valuable resource of staffing & allow them time to recovery & recharge.
attributes.background: Please debate giving ALL NHS staff one weeks extra Annual Leave to allow them to recover & recharge before more leave the professions putting the quality of care at risk for all patient groups. We need our NHS to remain ‘world class’ & retention of their expertise is vital to maintain this status.

rejection.details:
The NHS is responsible for decisions about annual leave, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You might like to sign the following petitions:

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

To pay every NHS and Social Care Worker in England a £500 "Thank You" Bonus: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/562495
